state.response: اسٹیفن ہاکنگ نے ہماری کائنات کی سمجھ میں بہت سے اہم کردار ادا کیے، جیسے بلیک ہولز کے دھماکوں کا نظریہ، ہاکنگ ریڈیئیشن، اور ہارٹل–ہاکنگ اسٹیٹ۔

اسٹیفن ہاکنگ نے ہماری کائنات کی سمجھ میں: Stephen Hawking contributions to understanding the universe Stephen Hawking role in cosmology

Hawking's work on black holes, a natural step on from the Big Bang, established our current understanding of these gravitational monstrosities. Among other things, he discovered the notion of an event horizon of a black hole, the boundary of no return that surrounds the central singularity.
Stephen Hawking contributions to understanding the universe Stephen Hawking role in cosmology

Hawking was the first to set out a theory of cosmology explained by a union of the general theory of relativity and quantum mechanics. Hawking was a vigorous supporter of the many-worlds interpretation of quantum mechanics.
اسٹیفن ہاکنگ نے بلیک ہولز کے دھماکوں کا: Stephen Hawking black holes explosion theory Stephen Hawking contribution to black holes
Hawking ran the theory of the collapse that forms black holes in reverse, showing that the universe must explode into being from a single point in space and time.
Stephen Hawking black holes explosion theory Stephen Hawking contribution to black holes

It was Hawking's investigation of black holes' nature that would prove revolutionary. Initially, his work suggested that a black hole could never get smaller.

اسٹیفن ہاکنگ نے ہاکنگ ریڈیئیشن کا نظریہ: Stephen Hawking Hawking radiation theory Who proposed Hawking radiation theory?

Hawking eventually squared the two ideas in 1974, showing that black holes could have entropy and emit radiation over very long timescales if their quantum effects were taken into account. This phenomenon was dubbed "Hawking radiation" and remains one of the most fundamental revelations about black holes.
Stephen Hawking Hawking radiation theory Who proposed Hawking radiation theory?

Stephen W. Hawking proposed in 1974 that subatomic particle pairs (photons, neutrinos, and some massive particles) arising naturally near the event horizon may result in one particle's escaping the vicinity of the black hole while the other particle, of negative energy, disappears into it.
اسٹیفن ہاکنگ نے ہارٹل–ہاکنگ اسٹیٹ کا نظر: What is the Hartle-Hawking state theory? Stephen Hawking Hartle-Hawking state

One proposal, the Hartle-hawking state, offered by the Late astrophysicist Stephen Hawking and astrophysicist James Hartle, hypothesizes that there were no pre-existing conditions leading to the formation of the singularity, but instead the universe inflated from a single point in space and time to fill up the ...
What is the Hartle-Hawking state theory? Stephen Hawking Hartle-Hawking state

Hawking and Hartle said the universe doesn't have a boundary, much like Earth's rounded surface lacks an edge. Hawking likened his no-boundary proposal (aka Stephen-hawking-Hartle state) for the universe to traveling southward until you reach the South Pole.
